title: Did the Department of Legal Drug Control add artificial marijuana while it kept the "real thing " illegal?
subtitle: Since 1985, the use of this substance for medical purposes, albeit biological but synthetic, has been approved, but only recently in a liquid formulation.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The Department of Drug Control has recently classified synthetic marijuana as a legally accessible drug in Table II, while it has continued to list plant marijuana as a drug listed in Table I. There is currently no acceptable medical use.
